name: starkshield-circuits
description: ZK circuits for StarkShield dark pool

scripts.compile:all: npm run compile:intent && npm run compile:settlement
scripts.setup:intent: snarkjs groth16 setup build/intent_circuit.r1cs ptau/powersOfTau28_hez_final_18.ptau build/intent_circuit_0000.zkey
scripts.setup:settlement: snarkjs groth16 setup build/settlement_circuit.r1cs ptau/powersOfTau28_hez_final_18.ptau build/settlement_circuit_0000.zkey
scripts.contribute:intent: snarkjs zkey contribute build/intent_circuit_0000.zkey build/intent_circuit_final.zkey --name="StarkShield Contributor" -v
scripts.contribute:settlement: snarkjs zkey contribute build/settlement_circuit_0000.zkey build/settlement_circuit_final.zkey --name="StarkShield Contributor" -v
scripts.export:intent: snarkjs zkey export verificationkey build/intent_circuit_final.zkey build/intent_verification_key.json
scripts.export:settlement: snarkjs zkey export verificationkey build/settlement_circuit_final.zkey build/settlement_verification_key.json
scripts.test:all: npm run test:intent && npm run test:settlement
